00036 **  I added a sending of an Event message from EVS on the first time an EVS-unregistered
00037 **  application tries to send an event message. A system log message is also written
00038 **  Revision 1.8 2007/03/05 14:08:43EST njyanchik 
00039 **  This CP fixes the fact that there were multiple event messages using the same event ID, but 
00040 **  using different (but similar) event text. The issue was fixed by making all the text generic, and 
00041 **  providing a command code parameter that specified what command the message was comming
00042 **  from.
00043 */
